inputs.name: cloneServer
inputs.label: SQL Clone Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the SQL Clone Server Endpoint.

inputs.name: imageNameForClone
inputs.label: Image name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The image the clone should be created from. Build and Release variables can be used here.

inputs.name: cloneSqlServer
inputs.label: SQL Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target SQL Server to create the clone on. This SQL Server instance must have already been added to the SQL Clone Server specified above.

inputs.name: cloneName
inputs.label: Clone name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the clone, which will also be the database name. Build and Release variables can be used here.

inputs.name: deleteClone
inputs.label: Delete clone if exists
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete any existing clone with the same name prior to creating this clone.
